column4: I am running ubuntu latest version, how do I install another distro which is in ISO format without burning a cd/DVD or using a USB?
i've never done it, but you can somehow add an ISO as a boot option to Grub.
Hmmm..I basically just wanna mount it and install it but have no media just the iso..
i think you'd need the Grub method - not 100% sure though.
